code: import*as R from'ramda';import{ADD_clothe_TO_BASKET,REMOVE_clothe_FROM_BASKET,CLEAN_BASKET}from'actionTypes';var initialState=[];export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var _ref=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined,type=_ref.type,payload=_ref.payload;switch(type){case ADD_clothe_TO_BASKET:return R.append(payload,state);case REMOVE_clothe_FROM_BASKET:return R.without(R.of(payload),state);case CLEAN_BASKET:return[];default:return state;}});
